name: Ticker
description:
WE HAVE LOST CONTROL OF THE FOREST.

WE HAVE NO CONTROL. I REPEAT,

WE HAVE NO CONTROL.

The entire world has been set ablaze by an intense passion for jamming. Now it's up to you to quell the blaze that is eating at our inner souls.

Objective:

Toss blue liquid at the flames until they go away.

Controls:

ForwardWLeft
ABackwardSRightDThrow Blue LiquidLeft-click
